trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: 为 Windows 工具栏对象提供容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> 的基类。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>及其关联类在新的 Windows 窗体应用程序中创建工具栏可以拥有 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自定义外观和行为，以期或主题，而无需具有溢出和运行时项目的支持重新排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 控件还提供丰富的设计时体验，包括在就地激活和编辑、 自定义布局和共享中指定的水平或垂直空间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>类提供了很多管理的绘制、 鼠标和键盘输入和拖放功能的成员。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>类，该类具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>类，以获得更多控制和自定义与所有的绘制和布局样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>Windows 窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 以下各项专门用于与都无缝配合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有的方向。

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: 会在设计时按默认提供的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件：

trans-unit.source: You can join <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: 可以加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>内指定的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>和合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>与每个其他控件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>对于多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>除非它绝对定位的而不停靠或在不参与的 tab 键顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>类来承载在任何其他 Windows 窗体控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>进行双缓冲，利用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer>设置。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 替换了早期版本的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>向 Windows 窗体，将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，并将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class with the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />s.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 数组初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否通过您实现的事件来处理拖放和项重新排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to control drag-and-drop and item reordering through events that you implement; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过您实现的事件来控制拖放和项重新排序，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>属性`true`并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>属性`false`响应已定义中的拖放行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>到`false`并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>到`true`导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>类来处理拖放和项自动重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>到`true`两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>对象以允许从一台拖动项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>相互。

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用默认拖放，必须在拖动操作期间按 ALT 键。

trans-unit.source: Setting both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>到`true`引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder" /> are both set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder" /> 均设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled privately by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个用于指示是否专门由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类处理拖放和项重新排序操作的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cause the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类自动处理拖放和项重新排序，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, and other types can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否将多个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 及其他类型进行组合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if combining of types is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许组合类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A> property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A>属性来启用多文档界面 (MDI) 子要组合的 MDI 父代中其各自的菜单。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is bound and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 要绑定到的容器的边缘，并确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 如何随其父级调整大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>属性来定义如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 锚定到其父控件的控件，可确保时调整父控件的锚定的边缘保留在父控件的同一位置相对于边缘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>属性是互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整控件的大小以显示其完整内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件调整宽度以完整显示内容，值为 <see langword="true" />；反之，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>到`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>嵌入在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>面板的边界<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>移动时不会进行转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到不同的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 若要正确转换边界，同步<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>事件，检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>属性及调整大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />属性在派生类中，使用基类的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />属性来扩展的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你必须提供所有实现。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 你无需重写二者，<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />访问器<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />属性; 你可以根据需要重写只有一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding context for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>返回单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>所包含的所有数据绑定控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>保留绑定到同一数据源同步的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>所有数据绑定控件所都指向的基础列表中指定的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建一个新的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>和将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />属性在派生类中，使用基类的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />属性来扩展的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你必须提供所有实现。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property; you can override only one, if needed.
trans-unit.target: 你无需重写二者，<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />访问器<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />属性; 你可以根据需要重写只有一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be sent to an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的项发送到溢出菜单。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> items to an overflow menu; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 项发送到溢出菜单，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A> property to `true` to send a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item to an overflow menu when the item's content exceeds the width of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A>属性`true`发送<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到溢出菜单项的内容超过工具栏的宽度时的项。

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the ToolStrip Items Collection Editor to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更多溢出项不是可以显示在窗体上，，使用 ToolStrip 项集合编辑器来管理这种情况。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the docking location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, indicating which borders are docked to the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的停靠位置，以指示哪些边框停靠到容器上。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the default direction in which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control is displayed relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控件相对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的默认显示方向。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default spacing, in pixels, between the sizing grip and the edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 表示间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的内容的内部间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value of <c>(0, 0, 1, 0)</c>.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />值<c>（0，0，1，0）</c>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are padded one pixel from the right edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to prevent the right border from painting over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>从的右边缘的填充一个像素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>以防止绘制通过右边框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>即右对齐。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 默认显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的默认 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A>属性表示<xref:System.Drawing.Size>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>最初创建时。

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调整大小的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>通过设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护更好的性能，不要设置<xref:System.Drawing.Size>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其构造函数中。

trans-unit.source: Instead, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反，重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" /> property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the preferred dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" />派生类中的属性，它是更可取的方法返回<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />使用首选的维度，而无需重写所有的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subset of items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, including items that are automatically added into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上显示的项的子集，其中包括自动添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> representing the items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />，表示当前在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to access only those items that are currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>属性来访问只当前显示的项。

trans-unit.source: These are the items that are not currently in an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: 这些是当前未溢出菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection to retrieve all the items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合检索的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current display rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 检索当前显示矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> area for item layout.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示项布局的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 区域。

trans-unit.source: The display rectangle is the area where you lay out items.
trans-unit.target: 显示矩形是其中布局项的区域。

trans-unit.source: The position and dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> display rectangle change during automatic scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 位置和尺寸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>显示期间自动滚动的矩形更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 边框，并确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>属性来定义如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>将其自身对齐其父控件的左边缘和根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控件停靠在其 z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> can be repositioned within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and across <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件处于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>内可重新定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>并跨<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property is ignored, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property is `false`, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> grows as items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>属性将被忽略，并且如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>属性是`false`，大小为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>将随着项被添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不参与 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>属性是互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。

trans-unit.target: 表示间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> property to get or set the space around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> move handle.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=nameWithType> can take individual values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, you can adjust the space around the move handle as preferred.

trans-unit.source: The margin can even be off the edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 边距甚至可以是关闭的边缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that contains the image displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 项上显示的图像的图像列表。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in pixels, of an image used on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上所用图像的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value representing the size of the image, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，表示图像的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16 x 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 16 x 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> property to control the default size of an image.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>属性控制图像的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> to make the size of the image on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to automatically adjust to fit on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>以使图像的大小在上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>自动调整以适合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>同时保留原始图像的比例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户当前是否正在将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 从一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 移到另一个。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户当前正在将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 从一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 移到另一个，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否为该项可识别的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符应直接发送到该项而不必经过预处理，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A>在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接发送到给定的输入的字符过程中调用方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A>方法返回`true`，指定的字符将直接发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果该方法返回`false`，字符被预处理并仅发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>如果它不使用预处理阶段时。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection to retrieve all the items that have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, not just the items that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合以检索已添加到的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，而不仅仅是显示的项。

trans-unit.source: An item remains in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection even if it is an overflow item and is therefore not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 项保留在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>即使它是否为溢出项，因此当前可见的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to retrieve only the items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is complete.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的布局完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: 当项不适合在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出按钮自动显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置确定是否项出现在溢出区域始终，根据需要或永远不会。

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件，以确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果当前根本未显示。

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不显示项的通常原因是，在主无法容纳该项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow" />.

trans-unit.source: The sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 大小调整手柄将不会显示，除非您还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性为溢出值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>，大小调整手柄将不会显示。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键已由控件处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>消息以处理对话框字符，例如选项卡、 返回、 转义符，和箭头键在预处理期间调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>方法指示控件未在处理该键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> simply sends the character to the parent control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>只需将字符发送到父控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />派生类中的方法，控件应返回<see langword="true" />以指示它已处理该键。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 不会处理由控件调用基类的结果的密钥<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法应返回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控件将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A>调用方法来使控件有机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态以及给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 这种默认实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只返回`false`，以指示该控件具有没有助记键。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the look and feel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于自定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的外观的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the look and feel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />，用于自定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的外观。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class to customize the look and feel of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that does not have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>类自定义的任何外观和感觉<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>不具有窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: To do this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property, and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，派生类从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>属性并调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates which visual styles will be applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示将把哪种视觉样式应用到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the visual style to apply.
trans-unit.target: 指示要应用的视觉样式的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.ManagerRenderMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.ManagerRenderMode" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to indicate which set of visual styles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> will use.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以指示该字符集中的视觉样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>将使用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a professional rendering style, a default system rendering style, or a style managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性指定专业呈现样式、 默认系统呈现样式或由管理样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value being set is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.Custom" /> without the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer" /> property being assigned to a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> 设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.Custom" />，但是没有为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer" /> 的新实例分配 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Controls the return location of the focus.
trans-unit.target: 控制焦点的返回位置。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RestoreFocus%2A> method to control where the focus returns to when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RestoreFocus%2A>控制其中焦点返回到方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定要选择的控件的方向，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" /> 则在 Tab 键顺序中前移；如果为 <see langword="false" /> 则在 Tab 键顺序中后移。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 激活子控件。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 还可以指定从中选择控件的 Tab 键顺序的方向。

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: `directed`和`forward`参数由容器风格的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: 当`directed`参数设置为`true`、`forward`参数进行计算以确定哪个控件进行选择。

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当`forward`设置为`true`，则在 tab 键顺序中的下一步控件被选定; 时`false`，选择上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.Selectable?displayProperty=nameWithType> style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Select%2A>方法激活的控件，如果控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.Selectable?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式位设置为`true`，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 中是否从一端拉伸到另一端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的项提供焦点。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按 TAB 键时，将输入的焦点设置为下一步<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Controls with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 控制与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性值`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value for controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过更改操作的 tab 键顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>集合中的控件的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which to draw text on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上绘制文本的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection.Horizontal" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property to get or set the direction of the display text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>属性来获取或设置的显示文本的方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> itself, in which case the setting will apply to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> you add to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property differently for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>本身，在这种情况下设置将应用于每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>将添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，也可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>以不同方式为每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>属性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" /> class, which provides basic properties for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" /> 类的一个实例，它为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" /> 提供基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 所有消息都发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法通过进行筛选后的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的函数文档位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method to handle operating system messages identified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法以处理操作系统消息中标识<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构。

trans-unit.source: The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。

trans-unit.source: For information about the available <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值，请参阅平台 SDK 文档参考位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 在平台 SDK （核心 SDK 部分） 下载，还可以在 MSDN 中包含的 windows.h 标头文件中找不到实际的常量值。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: 继承控件应调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法来处理它们不处理任何消息。
